docs.title: FEATURES
docs.text:
• simulation & Offline file generation
  • support KUKA, ABB, UR,
  • custom bot
  • Support multiple processes
  • KUKA & ABB Communication and Control

docs.title: ABOUT
docs.text: FURobot It is a robot simulation and tool software，it comes from FabUnion.

docs.title: 特点
docs.text:
• 仿真 & 离线文件生成
  • 支持 KUKA, ABB, UR,
  • 自定义机器人
  • 支持多种工艺
  • KUKA & ABB 通信与控制
